page.title: 18Foreign travel from Ipplepen
page.content: Holidays. We asked{57 people}from the two top classes of{our school}and their teachers if they had ever been{abroad for their holidays.{39 people had. Listed below are the{countries}they {visited.}Some people had visited more than one country. France 18 Morocco 1 Spain 11 Tunisia 1 New Zealand 1 Cyprus 1 Canada 1 Yugoslavia 2 Holland 1 India 1 Australia 2 Saudi Arabia 1 Portugal 6 Hawaii 1 Greece 5 Canary Is. 2 Italy 4 Austria 8 Switzerland 4 Sweden 1 Germany 5 Belguim 4 United States 6 Russia 1
